text: Alexander Yaroslavich Nevsky (; ; 13 May 1221 - 14 November 1263) was Prince of Novgorod (1236–40, 1241–56 and 1258–1259), Grand Prince of Kiev (1236–52) and Grand Prince of Vladimir (1252–63). Metropolite Macarius made him a saint of the Russian Orthodox Church in 1547."The Faithful Saint Prince Alexandr Nevsky" , article read on 4.11.2010. ==References== Category:1221 births Category:1260s deaths Category:Russian Orthodox Christians Category:Russian princes and princesses
title: Alexander Nevsky
